meta.title: Dmytro Morar | React | Next.js Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing React / Next.js developer work and skills

personal.name: Dmytro Morar
personal.title: Full Stack Engineer | React + NextJS | 7+ years | Product mindset

about.bio: I'm a developer with over seven years of experience, working in different roles from developer to team-lead. I love creating things through code, especially when they bring real value to people. I'm really excited about AI and what it means for the future of web development.
focus: Developing high-performance React and Next.js apps
Implementing modern web development practices and patterns

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer (React | NextJS | Prisma | NestJS)
experience.description: Working on a web-based admin panel ecosystem for campaign lifecycle management and strategic data-driven decisions. The applications enable administrators to configure campaigns, define user roles and permissions, and allow customers to analyze collected campaign data.
achievements: Building and maintaining admin panel applications for campaign management and data analysis
Implementing responsive UI with role-based access and modern design systems
Managing API integration and server state using React Query and Axios
Setting up CI/CD pipelines and automating deployment processes
Deploying applications to VPS environments and ensuring production readiness

experience.title: React / NextJS Developer
experience.description: Developed an admin panel for an ed-tech company to manage courses, students, and user roles, enabling efficient course organization and progress tracking.
achievements: Built user-friendly, high-performance web applications using React.js/Next.js
Translated designs and wireframes into high-quality code
Optimized components for maximum performance across various devices and browsers
Developed new user-facing features using React.js/Next.js
Utilized various data structures and worked with remote data sources, REST APIs, and JSON

experience.title: Jn. Sergeant, Network unit
experience.company: Armed Forces of Ukraine / 68th Jaeger Brigade
experience.description: Served in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, supporting network operations and communication systems for the 68th Jaeger Brigade.
achievements: Provided unit provisioning and equipment accounting
Managed accounting for brigade communications equipment
Handled firmware updates for radio equipment
Supported operation of repeater systems

experience.title: Frontend Developer / Teamlead
experience.description: Led development of a web platform for an apparel-focused company, facilitating collaboration between designers and customers to streamline design processes and project management.
achievements: Led the frontend team to deliver sprint goals and new features
Communicated with business stakeholders to align technical and business objectives
Designed and implemented collaboration-focused features with real-time updates
Mentored new teammates and contributed to hiring decisions
Participated in interviews
Made key architectural decisions to support scalability and collaboration

experience.title: Frontend Developer / Teamlead
experience.description: Managed frontend development for a high-traffic e-commerce platform supporting over 300k monthly users, ensuring a seamless online shopping experience.
achievements: Coordinated with business teams to prioritize user conversion and retention features
Optimized performance and scalability through architectural improvements
Led scrum meetings and ensured smooth team communication
Introduced React Query and Styled Components for a maintainable codebase
Supported onboarding and recruitment of new developers

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a high-traffic e-commerce platform for a leading furniture brand.
achievements: Developed reusable components and UI modules
Implemented mobile-first approach for responsive design
Improved site performance and loading speed
Managed production deployments and updates

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Worked in a web agency specializing in developing e-commerce sites for small businesses, delivering user-friendly interfaces, responsive designs, and optimized performance to boost online sales.
achievements: Built responsive markups from PDF to HTML
Implemented mobile-first approach for all projects
Developed custom plugins for various CMS platforms
Customized admin panels for better user experience
Integrated markup into CMS pages
